ai-patthana16.57:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.57:0.3_0: for one who is attached to charming what belongs to self,
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for anyone or get rid of repulsion. Nor can understand how this is the cause or reason for someone else.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for anyone or get rid of repulsion. Nor can understand how this is the cause or reason for someone else.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_2: An involved when someone doesn’t get rid of resentment, or cause or reasons to give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_3: Such things don’t arise because of annoying, or with resentment, because of wrong view, nor because of failure in morality, nor because of any cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.57:2.1_0: One thing doesn’t get rid of resentment for someone else to understand the teaching, or for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of fun.
ai-patthana16.57:3.1_0: Without taking food or without reservation of someone else, that of the impediments does not arise when someone else gives rise to suitable speech, nor does he have any cause or reason for these six reasons.
ai-patthana16.57:3.1_1: the section dealing with the eighteen objects ...
ai-patthana16.57:3.1_2: who are fifteen on one another’s offenses ...
ai-patthana16.57:4.1_0: One thing doesn’t give rise to repulsion for anyone or get someone else to understand this. It doesn’t give rise to only if I haven’t allowed robes.
ai-patthana16.57:4.1_1: the section dealing with the eighteen objects ...
ai-patthana16.57:4.1_2: who are fifteen on one another’s offenses ...
